title: Diamond Floral Jadau Necklace with Emerald, Ruby and Pearl Drop - Vaibhav Laxmi Haaram
materials: Crafted in 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VS Clarity
and a lustrous South Sea Pearl drop. The setting is meticulously handcrafted.
features: Inspired by traditional Jadau craftsmanship, this necklace features an intricate floral motif encrusted with dazzling diamonds. The pendant showcases a central emerald, leading to a larger pendant with a ruby at its heart, culminating in a single pearl drop for a touch of classic elegance. The detailed openwork design and diamond-studded floral patterns provide a regal, luxurious aesthetic.
occasions: and other grand celebrations like Seemantham or a milestone birthday. Also suitable for high-end social events and formal gatherings.
description: This exquisite Haaram is a timeless heirloom piece. The combination of high-quality diamonds, vibrant gemstones, and the classic pearl drop creates a stunning and luxurious look. It is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and durability. The intricate Jadau work represents a rich cultural heritage, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
